about_the_game:
Koko, the Last Leaf, is a fantastical adventure and fighting game where you play as the last of the Leaf kind, seeking revenge against the evil Gods.

explore A Vast Magical World


Dive deep into the lush lands of the children of the Gods. Magical enemies and peculiar friends await you in this colorful and surprising world.

Fight For Revenge


Battle, outwit, and defeat the bosses and unique enemies that lay scattered throughout the world. Seek out those who have destroyed your kin and deliver vengeance with a swift hand.

use the Power Of the Gods


Discover magical abilities that allow you to draw upon the power of the Gods. These abilities will allow you to explore deeper, learn secrets, and grow stronger.

unravel the Mysteries Of the Past


As you explore, discover hints to unfold the story of the Leaf kind’s destruction. The secrets you unearth will guide you in your journey and reveal disturbing truths about the Gods.

Features


  • Precise 2D platforming
  • Satisfying and challenging combat with skills and abilities that will aid your fighting
  • Hand-drawn pixel art animation
  • Metroidvania qualities that reward exploration
  • A large world with magical secrets, friends and foes

short_description: Delve into a mysterious world of Gods and magic as the last of the leaf kind. Fight epic battles for revenge against evil forces. Explore fantastical lands inhabited with magical creatures and peculiar allies. Search for the realm of the Gods and stop them from making a grave mistake.
